page.title: 08Arts/Crafts,New Galloway
page.content: Professionally, New Galloway boasts of a successful local artist, a clog-maker, a potter and a sculptor in woodwork. As is typical of many small villages, arts and crafts, as hobbies, feature prominently in the villagers' lives. In our survey, the most popular hobbies were knitting, rug-making, sewing, patchwork quilting and tapestry.(Gardening, fishing and golf feature in the outdoor hobbies). 70% of the women in the village, knit. Nine of the ladies intrviewed, actually, attend a sewing class in the neighbouring Dalry Secondary School. The majority of ladies have learned all they know from their Mothers and Grandmothers.
